speech: Welcome to David and Ram's Bike Shop. I can tell you the shop hours, I can set up an appointment, I can describe our bikes, I can sell you a bike, sell you gear, or I can recommend a route or ride group.
Thank you for visiting David and Ram's Bike Shop. I can tell you the shop hours, make an appointment, describe our bikes, sell you a bike, sell you gear,  or I can recommend a route or ride group.
I can also provide information about nutrition, bike transport, training monitor, or race information.
I have lots of information to share about nutrition, bike transport, training monitor, or races.
Feel free to ask about our warranty or financing options available.
Say skip payment to learn about our current promotion.
What can I do for you?
